gallery

Source: vignettes/gallery.Rmd
gallery.Rmd

Below are example plots made using this redlist R package. Click on a plot to view the R code on GitHub.

Author: Stanislas Mahussi Gandaho (2025)

Distribution of African Chordate Species by IUCN Red List Category

Proportional representation of Pan-African chordata species according to their latest IUCN Red List status, emphasizing the relative prevalence of threatened categories.

Author: Stanislas Mahussi Gandaho (2025)

Critically Endangered Distribution

Regional Distribution of Critically Endangered Species Assessed in the Latest IUCN Red List

Author: Stanislas Mahussi Gandaho (2025)

Critically Endangered assessment trend

Number of species evaluated each year under Critically Endangered category, based on their most recent published assessment
